text:
RELIGION

Ramayanam: R. Rangan, Sri Arunagirinathar Arangam, Kumaran Kundram, Chromepet, 6.30 p.m.

Koorathazhwan Vaibhavam: Kidambi Narayanan, Sri Andalammal Matam, Sanjeevaroyan Koil St., Old Washermenpet, 6.45 p.m.

Manisha Panchagam: R. Rajagopal, PS HSS., Mylapore, 6 p.m.

Perumai Mikka Pen Adiyargal: Sudha seshayyan, Asthika Samajam, Venus Colony 1{+s}{+t}St., Alwarpet, 6.30 p.m.

Kandhan Karunai: Madhivannan, Sanskrit College, Mylapore, 6.15 p.m.

Adi Sankara: Satyavratananda Saraswati, Kesari HSS., Pondy Bazaar Extn., T. Nagar, 5.30 p.m.

CULTURE

Sri Ramakrishna Math: Inauguration of ‘Vivekananda Navaratri and Divine Book Festival’, Vivekananda House, Kamarajar Salai, 5 p.m.

Sriram Bharathi Kalai Illakkiya Kazhagam: Mahakavi Bharathiyar 134{+t}{+h}birth anniversary celebrations, Sri Krishna Gana Sabha, T. Nagar, 5.15 p.m.

Vel’s Ragas and Vel’s Natyalaya: Vel’s Maha Utsav 2016, Mogappair, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

Auuro Educational Services: Convention on Education as ‘Empowering India through quality early years education’, Governor K. Rosaiah participates, Hotel ITC Grand Chola, 10.30 a.m.

Madras Diabetes Research Foundation and University of Alabama Birmingham, USA: Inauguration of seminar on ‘Prevention and control of non-communicable diseases’, Conran Smith Rd., 11 a.m.

Sruti Foundation: Distribution of awards, Sri Sankara Vidyashramam MHSS., South Avenue, Kamaraj Nagar, Thiruvanmiyur, 6 p.m.

Madras School of Social Work: HR Symphony on ‘HR Analytics’, Casa Major Rd., Egmore, 9 a.m.

CREDAI: Inauguration of Home Loan mela, Vijaya Mahal, T. Nagar, 10.30 a.m.

The Institution of Engineers: Inauguration of workshop on ‘Construction failures cause remedies’, Swami Sivananda Salai, Chepauk, 10 a.m.

Velammal Institute of Technology: Project competition on ‘Go Green 2016’, Panchetti, 9.30 a.m.

The Hindu Higher Secondary School Alumni Association: Alumni meeting, Big Street., Triplicane, 4 p.m.

Bharath SSS.: Annual day celebration, Adyar, 5.30 p.m.

C.S.I. St. Pauls HSS.: Beautification of Marina on the occasion of 300{+t}{+h}anniversary of school, Marina, 9.30 a.m.

Little Drops Hygiese for Health Trust: Interschool competition on science of hygiene, Sri Kailash Mahal, Ambattur, 9 a.m.

Theosophical Society (Kilpauk Lodge): Talk on ‘How to overcome worries’, Dr. Alagappa School, G.K.Rd., Purasawalkam, 6 p.m.

Periyar Library Reader’s Circle: Meeting, Periyar Thidal, Vepery, 6.30 p.m.

Narcotics Anonymous: Meetings, Turning Point Group, Arul Kadal Aikiya Aalayam, Santhome High Rd.; and New Attitude Group, St. Andrew’s Church, Choolai, 7 p.m.

Al-Anon: Meetings, Community Service Centre, Balfour Rd., Kilpauk; Alagu Andavar Temple, Korukkupet; TPI Kalyana Mandapam, Avadi; and Ganapathy Sachidananda Ashram Hospital, Baby Nagar, Velachery; and Iraivan Thantha Vaippu Kuzhu, Thiruvottiyur, 7 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meetings, Community Service Centre, Balfour Rd., Kilpauk; PS HSS., Mylapore; Advent Christian Middle School, Velachery Rd., Sembakkam; Risen Christ Church, Paper Mills Rd., Peravallur; Alagu Muthu Mariyamman Tirumana Mandapam, Periyar Salai; St. Teresa Church, Nungambakkam High Rd.; E.C.I. Zion School, 100 ft. Rd., Ekkatuthangal; Our Lady of Perpetual Help Church, Manali Town; Ganapathy Sachidananda Ashram Hospital, Baby Nagar, Velachery; Karthikeyan MHSS., Saligramam; D.B.I. Colony, C.T.H. Rd., Avadi; St. Vincent School, Assumption Church, Railway Colony, Choolaimedu; and C.S.I. Church, Arcot Rd., Virugambakkam, 7 p.m.
title: Chennai today
